text: The 2016–17 Albanian Basketball League, was the 51st season of the top professional basketball league in Albania. Finally, Tirana conquered its 19th title, the first one since 2012. ==Clubs and arenas== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! scope="col" | Club ! scope="col" | Location ! scope="col" | Founded ! scope="col" | Colours ! scope="col" | Arena ! scope="col" | Capacity ! scope="col" | Head Coach |- bgcolor= |Ardhmëria |Tiranë |2006 | |Asllan Rusi Sports Palace |3,000 | Afrim Bilali |- bgcolor= |Flamurtari |Vlorë |1924 | |Vlorë Sports Palace |1,000 | Vladimir Birçe |- bgcolor= |Kamza |Kamëz |1962 | |Bathore Sports Hall |500 | Adem Muhametaj |- bgcolor= |Teuta |Durrës |1925 | |Ramazan Njala Sports Palace |1,000 | Artan Kalaja |- bgcolor= |Tirana |Tiranë |1946 | |Farie Hoti Sports Palace |3,000 | Bujar Shehu |- bgcolor= |Vllaznia |Shkodër |1919 | |Qazim Dërvishi Sports Palace |1,200 | Bledar Gjeçaj |} ==Overview== In the last round of the regular season, leader Tirana beat Flamurtari, that lost all their matches, by 207–42 establishing a new record in the Albanian league. ==Regular season== ===League table=== ==Playoffs== In the finals, the seeded team played games 1, 3 and 5 (finally not necessary) at home. ==References== ==External links== *Albanian Basketball Federation site Category:Albanian Basketball League seasons Albania Basketball Basketball
title: 2016–17 Albanian Basketball League
